ok so without having to read the sudoers and visudo man pages, what exactly does it ido?
sudo:
uses the EDITOR variable, or the "editor" symlink, to open up the sudoers file
it copies the file to a temporary directory before the editor is opened
so that "visudo" will check the syntax of the file without... killing the sudoers file
and copy it if the syntax check has oassed
